DOC.brief_title: Topiramate Treatment Post Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.detailed_description: This twelve-week randomized , double blind , placebo control trial topiramate 40 patient PTSD . Diagnoses make Structured Clinical Interview DSM-IV ( SCID ) . Symptom severity measure Clinician Administered PTSD Scale ( CAPS ) , Davidson Trauma Scale ( DTS ) , Treatment Outcome PTSD ( TOP-8 ) , Clinical Global Impressions ( CGI ) , Hamilton Rating Scales Depression Anxiety ( HAM-D HAM-A ) . The Clinician Administered PTSD Scale ( CAPS ) primary outcome measure . Subjects read sign inform consent prior begin study procedure . Subjects meet inclusion/exclusion criterion randomize 1:1 ( Topiramate : placebo ) study medication . Study medication initiate one tablet daily ( 25mg topiramate placebo ) medication increase 25-100mg ( 1 tablet ) increments every 7 day , tolerate , maximum benefit achieve , exceed 400mg/day . Patients see every week Visit 4 , see every two week remainder study assessment efficacy side effect .
